<noinclude>{{structure info}}</noinclude>
There are two sizes of chest rooms. None of their chests have loot.

One [[vindicator]] spawns in each room.

;Large Chest Room (2x2_a2)
All of the [[flower pot]]s have [[blue orchid]]s.<br/>
All of the [[oak slab]]s are upside down, except for the ones in Layer 1.<br/>
Any [[flower]]s on top of the flower pot is what you put in the flower pot.
